author: kpedro88
body:
#### PR description:

Sporadic issues have been observed in IBs (see #31097) because ROOT is a bunch of landmines, stacked up, wearing a trenchcoat. Converting to a stream producer hopefully prevents such issues.

#### PR validation:

Ran WF 28234.0.

Will backport to 11_1_X, since the PR that converted it to a global module was also backported.
title: convert L1TkMuon to stream producer
